timeline.bodyText: I know this was my comment in the initial PR but now that I see it in action, I feel that the pollInterval shouldn't be necessary to pass in.. I still believe that this should be an option but not mandated and in case it is not passed we can take in a default interval.. you probably don't need to do it in this PR, just take care of it in a separate one.. I am also curious to see how other languages are doing it..
timeline.author: ankitarorabit

replies.bodyText: We can make an override function in the next PR to address this 👍🏻
replies.author: jbeauregardb
